title: Dwarf
description: This Dwarf pack will allow you to create a good amount of variations for your heroic fantasy project.
longDescription:
Rig is 64 bones and is rigged to the Epic Skeleton. 50 animations are included (16 being root motion variations)
List of content:
1/ a base dwarf body:13.5 Ktris, 2 materials (body and hair for eyelashes). 4096² textures. and a split version of the body (head, torso, arms, legs and feet)
2/ scale armor: 2.4 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
3/ leather padded armor: 2.65 Ktris, 1 materials, 2048² textures
4/ Pants: 2 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
5/ boots: 2.97 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
6/ Forearm armor: 5.27 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
7/ belly armor: 1.21 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
8/ shoulder armor: 3.87 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
9/ helmet A: 2.01 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
10/ helmet B: 1.57 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
11/ helmet C: 768 Tris, 1 material, 2048² textures
12/ horns (3 types: from 608 to 912 Tris) 1 material for all, 2048² textures
13/ shield: 1.5 Ktris, 2 material variation, 2048² textures
14/ haircut A: 2 Ktris, 1 Hair material, 4 color variations
15/ beard A: 1.1 Ktris
16/ eyebrows A: 128 Tris
17/ Axe: 774 Tris, 1 material, 2048² textures
18/ Double axe: 992 Tris,1 material, 2048² textures
19/ Mace A: 816 Tris, 1 material, 2048² textures
20/ mace B: 1.16 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
21/ mace C: 1.11 Ktris, 1 material, 2048² textures
22/ war hammer: 800 Tris, 1 material, 2048² textures
Preview: sketchfab.com/models/c8e2f41721a64f25868796acb145cc51
Intended for PC / MAC and latest Gen consoles
technicalDetails:
Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: No

Animated: Yes

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: up to 18.5 K max

Texture Resolutions: 4096² (body) // 2048² (for each prop)

Number of Animations: 50

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): Root Motion (16) and In Place (34)

Engine Compatibility: UNREAL ENGINE: 4.15

Intended Platform: Desktop PC / MAC / XBox1 / PS4

Platforms Tested: PC

Documentation Included: No

Important\Additional Notes: None
